title: Officer Interview
Interview Descriptions: Panel interview with structured questions. They were all very nice and encouraging during the interview. Did not take more than an hour. I heard back very quickly from them as well.
Interview Questions: Why apply and work at iMMAP?

title: MEL Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at iMMAP
Interview Descriptions: It was smooth and easy with questions about the job on both a technical and operational level. Received feedback within a week. The staff is nice and professional and easy to communicate with.
Interview Questions: How do you make sure you don't miss any deadlines?

title: Consultant Interview
Interview Descriptions:
You have to create a profile on their website in order to apply to jobs, which is a bit frustrating. 

Interview scheduling was rushed. Interview itself was straightforward and pleasant, with relevant HR and project staff in attendance. 

References were contacted without notifying me. I was informed two days later that they would reach out to references, but by that time they had already received emails, which was not appreciated.
Interview Questions:
Professional background relevant to the project
Working hours and flexibility 
Knowledge of key project concepts and terms 
Qualitative and quantitative research skills

title: Evaluation Officer Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at iMMAP in Sept 2020
Interview Descriptions: An urgent email was sent to me asking if I am interested in a short term evaluation position. I then applied and interview was scheduled the next day. The panel was made up of 3 professionals - two technical staff and one HR staff
Interview Questions:
1. Can you tell us why you are the best candidate in this role
2. Give us example of third party monitoring in which you participated, what are the processes
